title: Geo Shape
description: The geographic shape of a place. Based on http://schema.org/GeoShape.

@id.title: Shape Id
@id.description: The unique identifier of the shape.

xdm:description.title: Description
xdm:description.description: A description of what the shape is defining.

xdm:polygon.title: Polygon
xdm:polygon.description: A series of four or more coordinates where the first and final coordinates are identical.

xdm:circle.title: Circle
xdm:circle.description: A circular region with a specific radius centered on a geographic coordinate.

xdm:box.title: Box
xdm:box.description: The area enclosed by the rectangle formed by two coordinates. The first coordinate is the lower corner and the second coordinate is the upper corner of a rectangle.

xdm:altitude.title: Altitude
xdm:altitude.description: The specific or minimum altitude of the shape. This value conforms to the WGS84 datum and is measured in meters.

xdm:ceiling.title: Ceiling
xdm:ceiling.description: The maximum altitude of the shape. Only valid when used in combination with elevation. This value conforms to the WGS84 datum and is measured in meters.
